desc: A high-level commercial token commonly used in Thousand Sails City.

desc: Able to see through falsehoods

desc: Steps born on clouds

desc: Invulnerable to swords and spears

effects: cultivating on this bed yields twice the result with half the effort and avoids heart demons.

desc: A thousand faces for a thousand people

name: Divine Wind Boat
desc: A flying artifact

desc: Seizes the creation of heaven and earth

desc: Dragon and phoenix in harmony

name: Invisibility Cloak
desc: When worn
column6: making it difficult for even divine sense to detect.

name: Beast Taming Ring
desc: Placed on a demonic beast's neck

name: Void Armor
desc: Transformed from the Void Illusion Realm

desc: An imitation of Grand Supreme Elder Lord's alchemy furnace

name: Treasure Basin
desc: Put in one coin
effects: take out ten thousand; wealth rolls in.
